item.description:
We are going to meet at 10:00 AM (not PM!).
Thanks to Amy who pointed me to that mistake!

I hope that time is still o.k for you guys.


We will meet in the Starbucks at Davis Square Sommerville at 10:00 am. I am going to introduce my self and would like to discuss how we want this Meetup group to work.

Should we schedule a meeting every second week, once a month?Â 
What do you think about the location?
What are the topics most of the members are interested in?

group.name: The Boston German Language Meetup Group

item.name: Kick off meeting
